$schema.description: A pointer to the schema file used to validate/govern the format of this file.

Namespaces.description: A dictionary of namespace aliases with their longform urls to be used during de-serialisation.

GlobalVariables.description: A dictionary of key-value pairs available to the serialisation.

NamedObjects.description: A collection of named mapping instances that each target the same target class.

Relationships.description: A collection of named mapping instances that that each define a different mapping for the same target relationship.

Properties.description: A collection of named mapping instances that each define a different mapping for the same target property.

ClassInstances.description: A collection of mapping instances for a given TargetClass

TargetClass.description: The URL describing the class or type to assign to this object

URIBase.description: A URL segment describing the root URI for any entities created for this class

Instances.description: An unique instance for the headline TargetClass

InstanceName.description: A unique name for this instance

SubjectTag.description: The column-name to be used for this instance-mapping to identify the entity to be created.

ParentTag.description: The column-name (or null) to describe any parent-object to be used as part of its fully qualified name.

RelationshipInstances.description: A collection of mapping instances for a given Predicate relationship

Predicate.description: The URL describing the predicate to assign to this relationship

Instances.description: An named mapping instance for the headline Predicate

InstanceName.description: A unique name for this instance

SubjectTag.description: The column-name to be used in for this instance-mapping to identify the subject of the relationship.

ObjectTag.description: The column-name to be used for this instance-mapping to identify the object of the relationship.

PropertyInstances.description: A collection of mapping instances for a given Property relationship

Predicate.description: The URL describing the predicate to assign to this property pairing

Instances.description: A named mapping instance for the headline Property

InstanceName.description: A unique name for this instance

SubjectTag.description: The column-name to be used for this instance-mapping to identify the subject of the property.

LiteralTag.description: The column-name to be used for this instance-mapping to identify the literal value of the property.
